org.peertrust.event
Interface EventDispatcher

All Superinterfaces:
PTEventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
PTEventDispatcher
public interface EventDispatcher
extends PTEventListener

Receives events of the system and distributes them to the registered classes. Any EventDispatcher should implement this interface.

$Id: EventDispatcher.html,v 1.2 2005/08/09 13:58:45 dolmedilla Exp $
Date: 05-Dec-2003
Last changed: $Date: 2005/08/09 13:58:45 $ by $Author: dolmedilla $

Author:
olmedilla

Method Detail

register

public void register(PTEventListener listener)
Registers the listener for all events generated by this object.

Parameters:
listener - object to register with this component

unregister

public boolean unregister(PTEventListener listener)
Removes the specified listener from this dispatcher.

Parameters:
listener - object to remove from this components listeners
Returns:
true, if removal was successfull

register

public void register(PTEventListener listener,
                     java.lang.Class event)
Register the listener for only for certain type of events.

Parameters:
listener - object to register with this component
event - type of events the listener is interested in
